analysis.description:
SoundeonTokenMinter.bulkMint (/unique_chucks/19/0x303014ce11eed977b3fb26fe9ca9d2afe1ddcff7.sol#279-313) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_receivers[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/19/0x303014ce11eed977b3fb26fe9ca9d2afe1ddcff7.sol#292-293)

SoundeonTokenMinter.bulkMint has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(_receivers[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/19/0x303014ce11eed977b3fb26fe9ca9d2afe1ddcff7.sol#292-293)
